"The snapshot lists topics discussed in multiple meetings with FlowMart business, data & technical teams to understand business & technical overview, LOBs under small commercial, & curre

"FlowMart is a DataMart/Data Asset built on Teradata for Small Commercial Business Insurance tracking, Specifically for SELECT Line of Business.",
"Data Consolidation: FlowMart consolidates data from multiple data sources – SCBP, BI Workstation, etc. for reporting.",
"Data Warehouse: Used by Travelers' SC business to manage and analyze policy data"
"Policy Data Extracted from SCBP",
"Policy Data Loaded to Data Warehouse",
"FlowMart Data Consolidation & Transformation",
"Dashboard Data Preparation"
"ETL process performs data profiling and creates error logs.",
"Policy data is loaded to Data Warehouse.",
"Policy data extracted and stored on Semantic Layer.",
"Policy Data Extracted from SCBP:  Small Commercial new business policy data captured in the Strategic Commercial Business Platform (SCBP) and agent-facing Travis portal.",
"Reliance on Core Source Systems (FlowMart consolidates data from SCBP).",
"Process Understanding (FlowMart starts post-policy issuance, relying on SCBP data).",
"Granularity and Data Content (policy-level focus limits personas)."
"Policy Data Loaded to Data Warehouse: The daily SCBP policy data feed from Stage 1, containing new business policy records and related transactions (endorsements, e
"Manual Process Dependency (if ETL/data refresh is manual).",
"Delayed Insights (due to infrequent data warehouse refreshes).",
"Lack of Flexibility (legacy infrastructure limits integration of new data).",
"Automation of Teradata-to-FlowMart ETL. Is a key need"
"FlowMart Base Data Consolidation & Transformation: The integrated small commercial policy data, Various reference data sources are brought in to enrich and verify the dataset.",
"Excluded Segment Data (e.g., Northland/Northfield).",
"Difficulty Tracking Full Quote Journey (segmented data from policy systems).",
"Policy Type Nuances (Select vs. Agribusiness data elements) are not available",
"Dashboard Data Preparation: The fully consolidated FlowMart dataset that needs to be handed off to the MicroStrategy dashboard",
"Agribusiness Insights (missing quoted-but-not-issued data).",

w of the market landscape including Select, AgriBusiness, and NorthField/NorthLand, with a focus on data integration with FlowMart.",
"Each section lists key technologies, including Teradata, SQL Server, Python, MicroStrategy, QlikView, and others."
"Integration disparate legacy on-prem applications, databases using already available modern cloud-native technology platforms will create synergies and eff
"Lists applications, databases, infrastructure, languages, BI tools, number of users, and comments for Select, AgriBusiness,
"Key technologies include Travis, BIWS, SCBP, TAgS, NorthLink, ACE, Vista, Teradata, SQL Server, IMS, DB2, Mongo DB, Oracle Exadata, Ab-Initio, Autosys, MicroStrategy, QlikView, Pytho
"title": "High level dataflow – SELECT",
"Details the data flow for the SELECT business unit, from upstream sources through data marts and consumption.",
"Data flows through ETL processes (Ab Initio) to Teradata, SQL Server, and eventually to MicroStrategy and QlikView."
"title": "High level dataflow – Northland/Northfield",
"Describes data flow for Northland and Northfield, involving IBMi systems, NorthLink, and legacy NorthStar.",
"Data is processed on IBMi using LANSA and loaded into Oracle, with quotes handled through Ab Initio."
"title": "High level dataflow – AgriBusiness",
"Agribusiness data is managed through the TAgS system (IBM HATS for screen scraping), which handles quoting, rating, a
nd issuance, feeding into IMS mainframe databases",
"title": "FlowMart Current State - Data Governance & Data Quality",
"title": "Data Governance & Data Quality – Current State",
"Describes the current state of data governance and data quality efforts using DataLog (Alation).",
"title": "Current State : Data Governance – FlowMart",
"FlowMart-related data sources are cataloged in Datalog (Alation).",
"Data Lineage and Business Glossary has been maintained manually in RDEM"
"title": "Current State : Data Quality – FlowMart",
"Data Quality in FlowMart is very limited and at the introductory level.",
"Technical Checks includes like NULL value, Data formatting, and Duplicate detections.",
"Data Consistency Challenges : Business users report data discrepancies (e.g., mismatched counts, missing attributes).",
"Maintenance complexity: Data flows across multiple systems",
"Missing Data: Missing the data from other sources that are used in MSTR dashboard.",
"Inconsistent Data Updates: Data updates in the FlowMart is inconsistent",
"Operational Costs: Across small commercial market, current legacy applications, databases, integrations & development tools have significant operations and infrastructure costs."
"title": "Observations - Data workstream",
"Data Strategy : FlowMart operates as a market-specific data mart",
"Diverse Data Storage : Current data resides in various storage platform",
"Data Model : Dimensional data model with star schema.",
"Inconsistent Refresh Schedules : FlowMart data refreshes daily at 2 AM EST",
"Data Governance & Security : Limited data governance is implemented using Travelers' DataLog",
"Data Stewards : Data Steward model is place for Governances but not lot of activity and information is not updated in Da
"Data Quality : Basic DQ rules exist in ETL layers"
"No Single Source of Truth: Inconsistent data across the ecosystem",
"Missing Data : Missing the data from other sources and attributes",
"Use of manual scripts: The SCBA MicroStrategy team has created python scripts to create datasets on SharePoint",
"Manual Data Validation: DQ checks are performed manually",
"Multiple schedule of refresh: Due to multiple sources we have multiple manual rechecking for data and refresh those sources to get latest data",
"Data Security: Dashboard access is granted at the full-dashboard level",
"Too Many Dashboards: Too many dashboards in NorthLand/NorthField can overwhelm the data consumers"
"Specific Design: Only sources SELECT LOB data.",
"Granularity: Each LOB has a different data model.",
"Fragmented Data Sources: Complicated to make any enhancements",
"Data Availability : Unable to get right data to regional and field VPs in a timely manner.",
"Missing Data Attributes: Current Flowmart is missing additional Key Attributes.",
"Data Management Shortcomings: Although Datalog exists, it lacks Completeness",
"Manual Integration: Due to missing policy data and drawbacks of ETL technical design, a lot of manual processes and custom scripts must be created
"FlowMart is a data mart that empowers Business Insurance leaders to understand, monitor, and optimize the business lif
"Performance Management: Assesses agent, product, and regional performance, helps in making data-driven decisions to improve sales productivity, drives accountability by providing visibility into
"Standardized Reporting & Insights: Provides data for monthly performance metrics, dashboards are used by executives, product leads, and analysts for
"Business Planning & Forecasting: FlowMart data is foundational to business planning, helping forecast new business growth, agent engagement, and m
ess — driving higher quote-to-issue conversion, greater operational efficiency, and enterprise-wide data alignment",
"Single Source of Truth: FlowMart serves as the unified, trusted repository for policy data",
trics: Ensure consistent “apples-to-apples” comparisons across products and segments by eliminating data silos",
"Timely, Automated Data Delivery: Provide fresh, up-to-date data to decision-makers with minimal latency",

"Data Quality in FlowMart is very limited and at the introductory level.",
"Technical Checks includes like NULL value, Data formatting, and Duplicate detections.",
"Data Consistency Challenges : Business users report data discrepancies (e.g., mismatched counts, missing attributes).",
"Maintenance complexity: Data flows across multiple systems",

"title": "Observations - Data workstream",

"Inconsistent Refresh Schedules : FlowMart data refreshes daily at 2 AM EST",

"Manual Data Validation: DQ checks are performed manually",
"Multiple schedule of refresh: Due to multiple sources we have multiple manual rechecking for data and refresh those sources to get latest data",
"Data Security: Dashboard access is granted at the full-dashboard level",
"Too Many Dashboards: Too many dashboards in NorthLand/NorthField can overwhelm the data consumers"
"Specific Design: Only sources SELECT LOB data.",
"Granularity: Each LOB has a different data model.",
"Fragmented Data Sources: Complicated to make any enhancements",
"Data Availability : Unable to get right data to regional and field VPs in a timely manner.",
"Missing Data Attributes: Current Flowmart is missing additional Key Attributes.",
"Data Management Shortcomings: Although Datalog exists, it lacks Completeness",

"title": "Current State : Data Governance – FlowMart",

"title": "Current State : Data Quality – FlowMart",
"Data Quality in FlowMart is very limited and at the introductory level.",
"Technical Checks includes like NULL value, Data formatting, and Duplicate detections.",
"Data Consistency Challenges : Business users report data discrepancies (e.g., mismatched counts, missing attributes).",
"Maintenance complexity: Data flows across multiple systems",
"Missing Data: Missing the data from other sources that are used in MSTR dashboard.",
"Inconsistent Data Updates: Data updates in the FlowMart is inconsistent",
"Operational Costs: Across small commercial market, current legacy applications, databases, integrations & development tools have significant operations and infrastructure costs."
"title": "Observations - Data workstream",
"Data Strategy : FlowMart operates as a market-specific data mart",
"Diverse Data Storage : Current data resides in various storage platform",
"Data Model : Dimensional data model with star schema.",
"Inconsistent Refresh Schedules : FlowMart data refreshes daily at 2 AM EST",
"Data Governance & Security : Limited data governance is implemented using Travelers' DataLog",
"Data Stewards : Data Steward model is place for Governances but not lot of activity and information is not updated in Da
"Data Quality : Basic DQ rules exist in ETL layers"
"No Single Source of Truth: Inconsistent data across the ecosystem",
"Missing Data : Missing the data from other sources and attributes",
"Use of manual scripts: The SCBA MicroStrategy team has created python scripts to create datasets on SharePoint",
"Manual Data Validation: DQ checks are performed manually",
"Multiple schedule of refresh: Due to multiple sources we have multiple manual rechecking for data and refresh those sources to get latest data",
"Data Security: Dashboard access is granted at the full-dashboard level",
"Too Many Dashboards: Too many dashboards in NorthLand/NorthField can overwhelm the data consumers"
"Specific Design: Only sources SELECT LOB data.",
"Granularity: Each LOB has a different data model.",
"Fragmented Data Sources: Complicated to make any enhancements",
"Data Availability : Unable to get right data to regional and field VPs in a timely manner.",
"Missing Data Attributes: Current Flowmart is missing additional Key Attributes.",
"Data Management Shortcomings: Although Datalog exists, it lacks Completeness",
"Manual Integration: Due to missing policy data and drawbacks of ETL technical design, a lot of manual processes and custom scripts must be created

"title": "Current State : Data Quality – FlowMart",
"Data Quality in FlowMart is very limited and at the introductory level.",
"Technical Checks includes like NULL value, Data formatting, and Duplicate detections.",
"Data Consistency Challenges : Business users report data discrepancies (e.g., mismatched counts, missing attributes).",
"Maintenance complexity: Data flows across multiple systems",
"Missing Data: Missing the data from other sources that are used in MSTR dashboard.",
"Inconsistent Data Updates: Data updates in the FlowMart is inconsistent",
"Operational Costs: Across small commercial market, current legacy applications, databases, integrations & development tools have significant operations and infrastructure costs."
"title": "Observations - Data workstream",
"Data Strategy : FlowMart operates as a market-specific data mart",
"Diverse Data Storage : Current data resides in various storage platform",
"Data Model : Dimensional data model with star schema.",
"Inconsistent Refresh Schedules : FlowMart data refreshes daily at 2 AM EST",
"Data Governance & Security : Limited data governance is implemented using Travelers' DataLog",
"Data Stewards : Data Steward model is place for Governances but not lot of activity and information is not updated in Da

"No Single Source of Truth: Inconsistent data across the ecosystem",
"Missing Data : Missing the data from other sources and attributes",
"Use of manual scripts: The SCBA MicroStrategy team has created python scripts to create datasets on SharePoint",
"Manual Data Validation: DQ checks are performed manually",
"Multiple schedule of refresh: Due to multiple sources we have multiple manual rechecking for data and refresh those sources to get latest data",
"Data Security: Dashboard access is granted at the full-dashboard level",
"Too Many Dashboards: Too many dashboards in NorthLand/NorthField can overwhelm the data consumers"
"Specific Design: Only sources SELECT LOB data.",
"Granularity: Each LOB has a different data model.",
"Fragmented Data Sources: Complicated to make any enhancements",
"Data Availability : Unable to get right data to regional and field VPs in a timely manner.",
"Missing Data Attributes: Current Flowmart is missing additional Key Attributes.",
"Data Management Shortcomings: Although Datalog exists, it lacks Completeness",
"Manual Integration: Due to missing policy data and drawbacks of ETL technical design, a lot of manual processes and custom scripts must be created
